description: Dashboard for Spring Boot2 Statistics(by micrometer-prometheus).

targets.expr: irate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{instance="host.docker.internal:8080", application="HyperX_API_App", exception="None", uri!~".*actuator.*"}[5m]) / irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{instance="host.docker.internal:8080", application="HyperX_API_App", exception="None", uri!~".*actuator.*"}[5m])

title: 대한제분 API Statistics
